quest.name: When All Hope Seems Lost
journal: Matsya cannot help but fear the worst.
objectives: Search for the villagers of Palaka's Stand.

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: If Mehvan fled deeper into the jungle, she and her child are in grave danger! Wh-Whatever are we to do!? Gods have mercy!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You must try to stay calm, Matsya.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You cannot let fear consume you...

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Do you want to turn into a beast like the others?

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: But...how can I at a time like this? They could be dead!

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: So...if I allow myself to be overcome by this fear, I, too, might become a beast? I am not sure I understand, but I will do my best...

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Fear...consume me? What are you talking about?

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Then...I, too, could become a beast? I...I understand. I think.

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: M-Me? A beast? What are you talking about!?

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Gods... So that is what causes it? Then I have no choice...I must keep my fear in check.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I've seen to the wounded. How did the two of you fare? Did you find your friends?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...I see. In that case, let us help you find the mother and child.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Before we leave, we must ensure the village will be safe in our absence.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Alisaie and I will patrol the area and search for more beasts.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Would you and Matsya speak with Elder Yeruvvet? Pray explain to him the situation, and join us as soon as you are able.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We will save Mehvan and her child. We can do that much for Qerasaf...

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: <sniff> It will not be easy... But I will tell the elder about Qerasaf...

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: I am heartened to see you both safe, but what of the family?

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: We found Qerasaf, b-but...he...

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: Say no more. I understand. We have lost another of our dear friends...

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: Qerasaf may be gone, but there is still hope for Mehvan and their child. Please find them, I beg of you!

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: And if, in your search, you come across anyone else who escaped the slaughter, pray tell them what has happened.

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: I will do my best to keep the villagers safe...and their spirits high.

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Come, let us rejoin your friends at once!

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: Qerasaf and Mehvan married only three summers ago. The day their daughter was born...I had never seen them so happy. They did not deserve this─none of these people did.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We encountered no beasts during our patrol, thankfully.

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Where might Mehvan have run off to? Think, Matsya, think!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I'm pleased to report that the vicinity appears to be beast-free─no doubt thanks to your earlier efforts.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: And with that, let us resume our search for your friend and her child. Where should we begin, Matsya?

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: If we follow Ksiroda south, we will arrive at Purusa, a temple. It is a sacred place where people go to commune with the divinities.

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: It's possible that Mehvan sought shelter there, and perhaps other villagers as well...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Then it's settled. Matsya, stay close to me, all right?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: You two, take the lead. Keep an eye out for beasts and anyone in need of help.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Very well. We make for Purusa, as quickly as we are able. With me!

dialogue.name: SUFFERER04414
dialogue.text: Th-Thank you... I thought I was done for...

dialogue.name: SUFFERER04414
dialogue.text: Hm? Mehvan? She is a friend of mine, too, but I have not seen her...

dialogue.name: SUFFERER04414
dialogue.text: She must still be out there somewhere, trying to avoid the beasts. And with her child, gods... Worry not for me─I can make my way back to the village on my own!

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Forename, wait! Purusa lies just up ahead, but something terrible has happened!

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: The beasts have come, and many have already been killed!

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Alphinaud and Alisaie have gone to do what they can, but there are so, so many─more than I could count. You must be ready...

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: I...I am fine. I will be safe hiding here. Please, you must help those people!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Remain calm, and do not wander off! I will tend to the wounded.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Stay strong! We'll keep you safe─I promise!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Graaaghhhaggghhhrrr...

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: No... No... Gragnghhh...

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Aieeeaaaaaagh!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Urk... Urgh...

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: The villager transforms into a beast and lunges towards you!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text:
S-Someone...
heeeaaarlggghhhp.

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: No... Please...naaarrrghhh...

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: He...help...help meaaarrrghhh...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: There you are! How fare the others?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...I see. You've seen to all the beasts in sight? In that case, let's have everyone gather in front of the temple.
